‚û°Ô∏èWe need to fully understand the events of that day, so this doesn't happen again. 
‚û°Ô∏èOur nation needs to tone down the rhetoric and start treating each other like human beings instead of adversaries.

I pushed for a diplomatic boycott in a bipartisan resolution with @JimLangevin, @RepPerlmutter, and @EliseStefanik. 

Going forward, the International Olympic Committee must establish a process to disqualify countries if their governments are actively committing mass atrocities.

China has been engaged in threatening and oppressive behavior, highlighted by its actions in Hong Kong and Xinjiang and the disappearance of Peng Shuai. 

The Administration is right to announce a diplomatic boycott of the 2022 Olympics in Beijing.
